item.title: Automatic Virtual Contracts as Donation Support Mechanism for Humanitarian Crises
item.description: Tomorrow I head to Addis Ababa. It has been a decent wee while since I have been to Addis and I am excited to see where the years have taken it. Ethiopia is far – very far – from the We are the World days; yet, that image of Ethiopia is stuck in many people's minds – which is a shame because it is a beautiful, dynamic, and growing country with a lot to offer.
